thread.title: Dubai Police crack whip after Russian model's daring photo
thread.title_full: Dubai Police crack whip after Russian model's daring photo

title: Dubai Police crack whip after Russian model's daring photo
text: Filed on February 23, 2017 | Last updated on February 23, 2017 at 03.41 pm Share More > Vote The model, 23, was held up only by the hand of a male assistant as she leaned out into thin air from the tower in a bid to get the perfect Instagram shot. Dubai Police has warned Russian model Viktoria Odintsova, who climbed Dubai's Cayan Tower and dangled off the edge for a photo shoot without any visible safety harness.Police summoned Odintsova and made her sign an undertaking that she would not repeat such a stunt in Dubai. Watch the video here The model, 23, was held up only by the hand of a male assistant as she leaned out into thin air from the tower in a bid to get the perfect Instagram shot.The Russian model first tilted backwards over the huge drop, before dangling high above the ground from the arm of her bearded helper."I still cannot believe that I did it. Every time I watch this video, my palms get sweaty," she had said then.Odintsova posted the video on her social media page where it quickly went viral. Amira Agarib
